name: Sweet Mom
description:
When you have not enough money to buy food and too many children, some drastic choices have to be made...

Arrow keys: Move
Shift: Run
Space/E/Enter: Action (speak, grab, release)

Escape: Pause menu / Current mission / Tips

/!\ Web Player version: It won't work with Chrome or Edge, please use another browser. (Firefox, for example. Or Internet Explorer. Your choice.)
